review_title: Great employer and team to work with
pros: Friendly and supportive team with energy and ideas.
cons: Office is sometimes very busy with not enough desks
Shift pattern early late and weekends

review_title: Job can be rewarding, but Head Office structure could be improved
pros:
The manager and deputy at my service are supportive and hard-working; they create a good working environment.
Company employs really personable front-line staff so day-to day working experience has a good sense of team-work and community
cons: Structure from Head office is really lacking and schemes like those which are meant to support our mental health fall through sometimes with no other compensation to make up for it.

review_title: The team is great but frontline work remains undervalued unfortunately.
job_title: Recovery Worker in West Ealing, England
pros:
- very dedicated team
- managers higher up also seem interested in the work done and respond well to calls
Get involved with different departments and multidisciplinary teams
cons: High staff turnover and not many benefits
